WITH pi AS( SELECT p.pidx, p.pname, i.main FROM bg_product p INNER JOIN bg_image i ON p.pidx=i.pidx ), opOodR AS( SELECT op.pidx, op.oidx, op.oname, o.midx, o.rdate, od.quantity, r.ridx, r.contents, r.image1, r.image2 FROM bg_order_detail od
RIGHT OUTER JOIN bg_option op ON od.oidx=op.oidx
RIGHT OUTER JOIN bg_order o ON od.order_idx=o.order_idx
INNER JOIN bg_review r ON od.detail_idx=r.detail_idx ) SELECT opOodR.ridx, pi.main, pi.pname, opOodR.oname, opOodR.quantity, opOodR.contents, opOodR.image1, opOodR.image2 FROM pi LEFT OUTER JOIN opOodR ON pi.pidx=opOodR.pidx WHERE opOodR.midx=2 AND opOodR.rdate BETWEEN TO_DATE('2021/07/01','YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE('2021/12/31','YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY opOodR.ridx DESC
